title: Location Matters Vermillion’s Lakefront
map_address: 19 Overlook Dr. near West lake road
posting_body: Enjoy this airy beauty with the beach at your doorstep and panoramic lake views.
Private association beach is shallow, sandy, family-friendly.
Open floor plan, tons of light, windows and lake breezes.
Walk to the Vermilion Country Club to golf and the local convenience store for those last-minute beverages or grilling essentials.
Gas grill, washer and dryer, bedding, towels, microwave, flatware and dishes all included.
Two bedrooms: main bdrm w queen bed, guest bedroom sleeps three to four w double bed bottom bunk and single (twin) upper.
Minutes from Historic downtown Vermilion, Cedar Point, Sawmill Creek, local access to PutnBay, Kelly's Island and local wineries.
Great location for family gatherings or business travelers alike.
Please email dates of stay, number of guests as well as reason for stay to Suzie.
Available for month to month rental.
